statements: DELETE FROM glacier_movement WHERE glacier_id = 5 AND movement_type = 'Retreat';
DELETE FROM glacier_movement WHERE location = 'Himalayas' AND movement_distance > 10;
DELETE FROM glacier_movements WHERE glacier_id = 3 AND movement_direction = 'North';
DELETE FROM GlacierLocations WHERE region = 'North Pole';
DELETE FROM glacier_researchers WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM glacier_movements WHERE glacier_id = 123456 AND movement_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM glacier_images WHERE image_date = '2022-03-15' AND glacier_id IN (SELECT glacier_id FROM glacier_locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'Alaska%');
